title: Patch Note 6.4
body: Pls pls pls i need to know. when is the release date for Patch 6.4 im so hyped for blood moon yasuo i just have to get some clue of it being release {{champion:157}}

replies.body:
Tuesday or Wednessday

its supposed to be Wednesday but last patch was a Tuesday so im not sure

> [{quoted}](name=Talon12,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=EY87E4Mv,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-02-21T01:49:59.587+0000)
>
> Tuesday or Wednessday
> 
> its supposed to be Wednesday but last patch was a Tuesday so im not sure

hey  talon who should i buy naut or voli

hmmm....

Maokai!?

Naut is the cc overlord with plenty of damage for his plenty of tanky, his only downside is lack of sustained damage without his w active, he is one of the slowest (sea explorers!?) in the game. Voli is a tanky healing pesky bear which is hard to kill while his passive is active, though he delivers enormous amounts of burst damage with his w,r and q, while also having plenty of sustain damage from his w attackspeed, high base damage and r onhit effect, he is also very mobile.

Personally though i would get naut, because he gives out perma cc like junkmail(no one wants it) + the unexpected damage he does is also fun, he can also fill and role pretty well except for adc(i mean, you could try it)

ill be getting naut then :) ty
I herd that they will be nerfing yas and that's why they giving a bad ass skin joke or am i.

honestly wouldnt be a god damn surprise, even though he is harder to play than riven, and riven is easlity stronger, he gets nerfed and nerfed, while riven gets buffed, their reasoning? "You need good mechanics to do well at riven." NEWSFLASH riven is easier to use than yas, and easier to do well with than yas.
There are currently no Yasuo changes on the PBE. Check here: http://www.surrenderat20.net/p/64-pbe-cycle.html
you realise the skins don't get released immediately. They are just released within that patch. So could be released next Wednesday, or could be another 2 weeks from then.
